data.name: Work from Home - Lengthen your Life?
data.description:
How many years of your life could you save by working from home?

Write a function to figure out how many years you could save working from home.  Assume a year has 365 days.  Calculate the result over a time period provided in `[days]`.

Calculate this using the time in hours you'll save `[before]` work - waking up early to prep lunch; as well as `[after]` work - driving home in rush hour. 

Your solution should return a string "Working from home saves `x` years." containing the years saved, **rounded to three decimal places.**

Examples:

    before = 1.4, after = 1, days = 100 --> "Working from home saves 0.027 years."
    before = 1, after = 0.5, days = 1200 --> "Working from home saves 0.205 years."
